name: CyberPede
description:
Blast Through 3 Worlds Of Mayhem In This Action Roguelike "Centipede" Inspired Game For GDKO ROUND 4.

**KNOWN BUG: HEALTH SOMETIMES DOESN'T APPEAR ON CONTINUOUS RUNS**

  • Features Over 15 Levels Spanning 3 Areas
  • A Boss Fight For The Ultimate Finale
  • Mix and Stack Upgrades For Unlimited Content And Find Your Playstyle
  • Grind Bumpers For Loads Of Treasure 
  • Polished And Chaotic Gameplay Every Second

Can You Make It To The End? Can You Beat Super-Pede? Test Your Skills And Find Out.

Post-Jam Coming Soon With Balancing Tweaks, Bug Fixes And New Content.

(Alt to trigger FPS count)

Credits

Game By Me! Alfie Wilkinson.

Music From Video Game Music by Patrick de Arteaga

Tutorial Buttons By Home · Kenney

Title Art By Evil Yet Loveable Ghostbit Studios!
